text:
namaqstEByaqH svAhAq samU#Dhaq(gm)q rakShaqH saMda#gdhaq(gm)qrakSha# iqdamaqha(gm) rakShOq&Bi saMda#hAmyaqgnayE# rakShOqGnE svAhA# yaqmAya# saviqtrE varu#NAyaq bRuhaqspata#yEq duva#svatE rakShOqGnE svAhA$ praShTivAqhI rathOq dakShi#NA dEqvasya# tvA saviqtuH pra#saqvE$&SvinO$rbAqhuByA$M pUqShNO hastA$ByAq(gm)q rakSha#sO vaqdhaM ju#hOmi haqta(gm) rakShO&va#dhiShmaq rakShOq yadvastEq taddakShi#NA || 13
(tEByaqH-pa~jca#catvAri(gm)Sacca) (A7)
